commentBody: I generally like sports but this Super Bowl was unwatchable to me.  Too many commercials and ineptly played and officiated.  Stopped watching in the 3d period.

replies.commentBody:
Third period? Ooooookay. This was a very good game. As the old saying goes, "offense wins games, defense wins championships". What you witnessed was an outstanding defensive display. I realize that's not what the NFL and the casual fan wants, but for a true fan of the game, it was very entertaining.

And there are a lot of commercials, but many people look forward to them and that's also a good time to socialize.
